1.title: A Serene Lake

episode of.title: Voyage of Darwin's Beagle: On the Future of Species (TV Series 2012)

1.plot: Almost 180 years after Charles Darwin's journey around the world, his great granddaughter and a crew of authors, artists, and scientists follow in his footsteps. The first leg of their journey takes them from Tenerife to the rainforests of the Amazon.

2.title: Sunset Over Water

episode of.title: Voyage of Darwin's Beagle: On the Future of Species (TV Series 2012)

2.plot: Follow the team down the coast of South America and see some of the most impacting remnants of the slave trade. Then, tread in Darwin's footsteps as he discovers his first giant fossils, proving the existence of ancient and extinct animals.

3.title: One Small Step for Man

episode of.title: Voyage of Darwin's Beagle: On the Future of Species (TV Series 2012)

3.plot: In this episode, Sarah Darwin visits the last remaining members of a native tribe that was wiped out by European disease. Hear the history of the Beagle's incredible nautical resilience.

4.title: Low Life on the Ladder of God

episode of.title: Voyage of Darwin's Beagle: On the Future of Species (TV Series 2012)

4.plot: The clipper crosses the Strait of Magellan. Redmond examines the value of salmon farms, while Sarah retraces Darwin's journey into the Andes Mountains-an expedition he considered to be one of the highlights of his five year voyage.

5.title: The Last Frontier

episode of.title: Voyage of Darwin's Beagle: On the Future of Species (TV Series 2012)

5.plot: The Stad Amsterdam reaches the Galapagos Islands-the site of Darwin's most famous research. Explore the various islands with Redmond and Sarah, and meet some of their famous reptilian and feathered inhabitants.

6.title: The Final Countdown

episode of.title: Voyage of Darwin's Beagle: On the Future of Species (TV Series 2012)

6.plot: The crew makes for Australia to examine the profound effect that human habitation-and the introduction of invasive species-has had on the island. They are also confronted with the reality of how climate change has impacted the land and its inhabitants.

7.title: Adapt or Die!

episode of.title: Voyage of Darwin's Beagle: On the Future of Species (TV Series 2012)

7.plot: In this episode, Sarah and Redmond explore how Australia is helping to shape the future of mankind through gene research and artificial intelligence. They look into changes in the Earth's temperature over the past 50,000 years.

8.title: The Ruins of Progress

episode of.title: Voyage of Darwin's Beagle: On the Future of Species (TV Series 2012)

8.plot: The Stad Amsterdam's eight-month journey comes to an end. During this final leg, the crew stops at The Cape of Good Hope. While there, they study mischievous baboons, examine the remnants of apartheid, and meet the San-the oldest race in the world.

imdb.title: Voyage of Darwin's Beagle: On the Future of Species
akas: Voyage of Darwin's Beagle: On the Future of Species (United States)
plot: Voyage of Darwin's Beagle: On The Future of Species.
